title: Kasbeel
text: Named in the second section of the <a href="Book%20of%20Enoch">Book of Enoch</a>, the book of "Parables", Kasbeel is the <a href="angel">angel</a> given the responsibility of two oaths. The first oath was Biqa, a secret word that he asked the <a href="Michael%20%28archangel%29">archangel Michael</a> the pronunciation of. This oath revealed the angels in the <a href="Watcher_%28angel%29%23Grigori">Grigori</a> that were to fall, that showed all the secrets of the heavens to man. The second oath was Akae. This oath revealed the secrets of the cycles of the earth.
